((Its 1:00 A.M. I'm tried so forgive my grammer.Sorry for the tardiness of 
my reply. Also Inu-Yasha is Neo Bahamut Inu-Yasha has stages because of his 
size he use alot of power to save power he transforms Stage1 Whelp:Inu-Yasha 
stage2 Dragon Pup: Neo Bahamut Stage 3 Dragon: Bahamut Master Dragon: Kaiser 
Dragon ((Kaiser means Emperor Dragon which requires a Dragon master or Koj 
Gestalt))

Liono/Dark/Lilly/Kaiser/Rinoa/Tiamat/Key/Bluestinger.

::Lilly::
Blows open the pod hatch and Fires 8 proton arrows 2 take out the missiles 
aimed at Liono and Koj as the other 6 stream towards Pinsir.

::Key::
Keys stasis pod opens "Hey Killfest Chillout" Key fire rapid 25 shots from 
her Freeze gun at Killfest.

::Tiamat::
Tiamat Blows on the hatch and breaths a cone of plasma at the shell headed 
for Neo Bahamut. As locks on Aeroblast and Fires massive 25 Lancers at 
Aeroblast.

::Rinoa::
As her pod opens "Leave my husband alone!" Rinoa aims all for of her guns 
and fires she is able to destory one of the missiles heading for dark as she 
fires 14 sonic blast at endbringer and 10 at Aeroblast.

::Bluestinger::
Bluestinger opens her pod and proveds alittle help as she follow up Firing 
15 Plasma shots at Endbringer and 10 at Aeroblast.

::Neo-Bahamut::
Gets hit by the shots as he the burn his armor he races to meet Koj.

::Koj::
Koj getting slung around abit "A little help"

::Liono::
Liono races to parry the Motormaster thrust for Koj as motormaster's sword 
gets thrust into Liono shoulder as it leaks enegry Liono pulls it out and 
puts some distance between himself and Motormaster. As Liono fire 25 fire 
Rockets at Motormaster. ((High power exploding Fireballs)). "You Ok koj."

::Koj::
Koj grabs the fang and throw it to Liono "Lets show them we have some real 
power." Koj transforms into gestal mode.((The Fang has a mind of its own it 
man or may not obey Liono but It beats leaving it in space.))

::Liono::
Liono catches the fang as it use the stolen enegry to restore the holder 
closes some of Liono starts minior wounds.

::Neo Bahamut::
"About time" As Neo bahamut transforms into gestal mode

::Kaiser::((I say what they look like when I'm not so Sleepy))
"We are Kaiser!" 22 ft tall Kaiser good distance away from Motormaster looks 
at Motormaster extends his right arm towards him "Divine Dragon Cannon" As 
the dragon head snaps forward  Kaiser Fires a 25 rapid massive plasma blast.

::Dark::
Dark getting by a missiles his armor burns as it is charred gets back to 
back with Rinoa and Fires 25 plasma Rockets at Pinsir."Husband huh?"
